Translations.Text: ha-mim
soganda che a spasta (rite varnana kari denari) kitabana
ni:Sanka ame a kitabane barakatavali ratamam avatarita kari, ni:Sanka ame saceta karanara che
a ja ratamam dareka thosa karyano nirnaya karavamam ave che
amara adesa pachi, ame ja payagambara banavine mokali'e chi'e
tamara palanaharani krpathi, te ja sambhalavavalo, janavavalo che
je akaso ane dharatino palanahara che ane je kami temani vacce che, jo tame yakina karata hoya
tena sivaya ko'i pujya nathi, te ja jivita kare che ane mrtyu ape che, te ja tamaro ane tamara purvajono palanahara che
parantu te sankamam padine mojamaja kare
tame te divasani raha ju'o. Jyare akasa khullo dhumado lavase
je lokone gheravamam la'i lese, a sakhata prakopa hase
Kahese ke, he amara palanahara! A aphata amari samethi hathavi de ame imana lavi'e chi'e
temana mate sikhamana kyam che, spasta rite janavi denara payagambaro temani pase avi gaya
to pana te'o'e temanathi modhum pheravi lidhum ane kahi didhum ke sikhavadelo, pagala che
ame prakopane saheja dura kari da'isum to, tame pharivara potani te ja sthitimam avi jaso
je divase ame sakhata pakada karisum, kharekhara ame badalo levavala che
ni:Sanka ame a pahela phira'aunani komani (pana) kasoti kari, jemani pase (allahana) pratisthita payagambara avya
ke allahana banda'o mane sompi do, ni:Sanka hum tamara mate nisthavana payagambara chum
ane tame allahani same vidroha na karo, hum tamari same spasta purava lavisa
ane hum mara ane tamara palanaharana saranamam avum chum, e vatathi ke tame mane paththaro vade mari nankho
ane jo tame mara para imana na lavata hova, to tame marathi alaga raho
pachi temane potana palanaharani samaksa du'a kari ke a badha aparadhi loko che
(ame kahi didhum) ke ratani ratamam tame mara banda'one la'ine nikali java, ni:Sanka (a loko) tamari pachala avase
tame dariyane rokayelo chodi do, kharekhara a laskara dubadi devamam avase
te loko ghanam bagica'o ane jharanam chodine gaya
tatha khetaro ane santivala ghara
ane arama karavani vastu'o, je vaibhavasali hati
avi ja dasa tha'i ane ame te badhi vastu'ona varasadara biji komane banavi didha
to temana mate na to ko'i akasa ane dharati radya ane na to te'one mahetala apavamam avi
ane ni:Sanka ame (ja) isra'ilana santanane apamanita kari denari yatanathi chutakaro apyo
Je phira'auna taraphathi hati, kharekhara te vidrohi ane hada vatavi janara loko manthi hato
ane ame bud'dhipurvaka isra'ilana santanane samagra srsti para sresthata api
ane ame te lokone evi nisani'o api jemam te lokoni spasta kasoti hati
a loko to avum ja kahe che
ke a ja amarum prathama vakhata (duniya manthi) mrtyu pamavum che ane amane biji vakhata uthadavamam nahim ave
jo tame saca hoya, to amara purvajone la'ine avo
sum a loko srestha che athava tubba'ani komana loko ane je temana karatam pana pahelam hata, ame te badhane nasta kari didha, kharekhara te loko aparadhi hata
ame dharati ane akaso tatha temani vacceni vastu'onum sarjana ramata-gamata mate nathi karyum
parantu ame temanum sarjana satya sathe karyum che, parantu temana manthi vadhare padata loko janata nathi
ni:Sanka nirnayano divasa, te badha mate nakki karela samaya che
te divase ko'i mitra, bija mitrane kama nahim ave ane na temani madada karavamam avase
sivaya te, jena para allahani krpa tha'i jaya, te jabaradasta ane dayalu che
ni:Sanka jhakkumanum vrksa
aparadhino khoraka che
je ogalela tamba jevum che ane petamam ukalatum rahe che
sakhata garama pani jevum
tene pakadi lo, pachi ghasedine jahannamani vacce pahoncado
pachi tena matha para sakhata garama panini yatana vahavo
(tene kahevamam avase) cakhato rahe, tum khuba ja ijajatavalo ane prabhutvasali hato
a ja te vastu che, jena vise tame sanka karata hata
ni:Sanka (allahathi) daravavala'o santa jagyamam hase
bagica ane jharana'omam
patala ane resamana posaka paheri sama-same betha hase
A evi ja rite che ane ame moti-moti ankhovali huro sathe temana lagna karavi da'isum
santipurvaka tyam dareka prakarana phalo mangase
tyam temane mrtyu nahim ave, ham prathama vakhatanum mrtyu, temane allaha ta'ala'e jahannamani yatanathi bacavi lidha
a phakta tamara palanaharani krpa che, a ja bhavya saphalata che
ame a (kura'ana)ne tamari bhasamam sarala kari didhum, jethi te'o sikhamana prapta kare
have tame raha ju'o, a loko pana raha ju'e che
